name: Kill the Xenobastards
description:
A short arcade shooter game with a Gameboy-looking.

Defend the humankind from an invasion of xeno species bastards.

Features

  • A Gameboy-looking retro visual style.
  • Space shoot-em-up with variety of enemies and a final boss.
  • Selectable difficulty level.
  • Full controller support.

Controls

This game supports keyboard and controller controls.

  • WASD / Arrows / L. Stick - Movement
  • Space / Button A / Button X - Fire
  • L. Shift / Button B / Button O - Shield
  • L. Control / Button RB / Button R1 - Rocket launch
